DEFAULT_DESCRIPTION: Welcome to Royal Institute of Technology (KTH) and the Student Union! THS, Tekniska Högskolans Studentkår, has three main objectives: 1. To ensure that everyday life as a KTH student is trouble-free and rewarding 2. To monitor and improve the quality of education at KTH 3. To server as a platform to connect students with business and industry, while offering skill development and professional networking.
